'''Atello Valera''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|Atello Valera's face is lined and weary, but his coat is tidily buttoned, his posture faultless.}} Atello is the head of the Valera family, responsible for ensuring the day to day operations of his escort business. His family subcontracts for the [VTC](/vtc/), protecting their goods and merchants as they make their way across the Deadfire.

=
* [A Bigger Fish](/aBiggerFish/): Atello wants you to get rid of a group of RDC sailors in [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/).
* [Family Pride](/familyPride/): After proving your worth, Atello asks for your help in the ongoing feud with their rival family, the [Bardatto's](/bardattoFamily/).
